projectGridLines.stationName: ITC Limited, PSPD (Paperboards and Specialty Papers Division)
projectGridLines.title: Equipment Reliability Improvement via Asset Performance Tool and Digital Twin
projectGridLines.description:
Description: To work on building data models for critical equipment like mechanical refiners using Asset Performance Management Software (Historical Data) and conceptualizing Digital twin setups using operational parameters, to improve equipment reliability through a predictive maintenance approach

Skill sets: Knowledge of key Mechanical Equipment, Data analytics in Excel and Python/R, Software Development (UI + backend)

Traits expectation: Passionate about equipment and process modelling and data analysis

Expected learning: Techno-managerial skill set to drive mill-wide project on equipment reliability

Specific courses required for project execution:  Mechanical, Chemical, Electrical Engg

projectGridLines.stationName: ITC Limited, PSPD (Paperboards and Specialty Papers Division)
projectGridLines.title: Historian Data Operations Management Tool & APP development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: To develop software algorithms for machine and process data management (50k+ parameters) in PI Historian server, managing server loads with multiple analyses running and induct data operations management via development of Admin Dashboards for efficiency tracking / web application.

Skill sets: Database management, know-how of servers, load balancing across data systems, Good Excel and Programming Knowledge in Python/R, Web application development, UI/UX development.

Traits expectation: Passionate about product dev, DBMS systems and software development 

Expected learning: Techno-managerial skill set in developing and maintaining a data Historian system along with tracking efficient usage of the same

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation Engg

projectGridLines.stationName: ITC Limited, PSPD (Paperboards and Specialty Papers Division)
projectGridLines.title: Post-Jumbo Process Optimization and Value Stream Mapping
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Optimiziation of process flow for different SKUs and streamline the material flow by improving process efficiencies and reducing conversion time and explore digital/automation technologies for the same

Skill sets: Supply Chain Analysis, Optimization techniques, Data analytics and Statistics in Excel 

Traits expectation: Passionate about streamlining manufacturing operations to reduce process times

Expected learning: Techno-managerial skill set in building schedulers and optimizing material flow

Specific courses required for project execution:  Production and Manufacturing Engg, Supply Chain Management, Operations Research

projectGridLines.stationName: ITC Limited, PSPD (Paperboards and Specialty Papers Division)
projectGridLines.title: Process Control Tower for reducing chemicals in Pulp Mill and Soda recovery cycle
projectGridLines.description:
Description: To identify optimal operation scenario for pulp production and soda recovery cycle, wherein the overall cost of operations remains minimal. The exercise is to make a process flow and apply theory of constraints and optimization to balance the requirements and ensure maximum efficiencies across systems, while bringing in financial/cost implications as well, using mathematical and programming tools like graph theory. Developing dashboards in Excel, Python and R

Skill sets: Chemical Engineering, Data analysis in Excel, Python and R, Process understanding

Traits expectation: Passionate about applying mathematical concepts for modelling and optimization of processes and developing dashboards for data analysis, insights and visualisation

Expected learning: Techno-managerial skill sets in Chemical Engineering Process Optimisation

Specific courses required for project execution: Stats and Probability, Numerical Optimisation, Process modelling and Computer programming

projectGridLines.stationName: ITC Limited, PSPD (Paperboards and Specialty Papers Division)
projectGridLines.title: Lime Purity Improvement and Furnace Oil reduction in Lime Kilns
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Work on improving efficiency of causticizing chemical reaction process to improve purity of resulting Lime circulating in the Caustic-Lime processing cycle to reduce Furnace Oil reduction in Lime Kilns

Skill sets: Chemical Reaction study, Data analysis, Chemical Engineering

Traits expectation: Passionate about chemical engineering and chemistry of materials

Expected learning: Techno-managerial skill sets in Chemical Engineering industry

Specific courses required for project execution: Chemical Engineering Courses and Reaction Modelling
